title: Shattered Girls
description: Ella’s decision to return to her doll form has caused more trouble than she ever thought possible.  Gabby’s a moody teen. The professor is gone. And people are going missing at alarming rates; including Gabby’s parents.  Robotic dolls - eerily similar to Ella - are popping up across the globe and nobody seems too concerned about it. Nobody except for Ella and Gabby.  With only the crazed Sianne left to help them, the girls must fight to find the truth behind the epidemic and the robotic dolls.  Only Ella doesn’t think they’re robotic at all…
author: Tyrolin Puxty
